SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AISnake
The AISnake class represents an AI-controlled snake entity in the game.
CustomButton
The CustomButton class extends JButton to create custom-styled buttons.
Direction
The Direction enum represents cardinal directions in a two-dimensional space.
Entity
The Entity class represents a game entity with a position and drawing capabilities.
EntityManager
The EntityManager class manages entities within the game.
Frog
The Frog class represents a frog entity in the game.
Fruit
The Fruit class represents a fruit entity in the game.
GameCanvas
The GameCanvas class represents the canvas where the game is displayed.
GameOverPanel
The GameOverPanel class represents the panel displayed when the game is over.
GamePanel
The GamePanel class represents the panel where the game is played.
Grid
The Grid class represents a grid-based game board.
Main
 
MainFrame
The MainFrame class represents the main window of the game application.
MainFrameListener
The MainFrameListener interface defines methods for handling main frame events.
MovingEntity
The MovingEntity interface defines a method for entities that have the capability to move within the game.
RandomPointGenerator
The RandomPointGenerator class generates random points within specified constraints.
Repainter
The Repainter interface defines a method for requesting a repaint operation.
Rock
The Rock class represents a rock entity in the game.
Score
The Score class provides utility methods for managing high scores.
ScoreEntity
The ScoreEntity interface defines methods for entities that have a score value and a growth length, which typically represents the effect of the entity when consumed by a snake or similar in a game.
ScoreUpdater
The ScoreUpdater interface defines methods for updating and managing game scores.
SharedRandom
The SharedRandom class provides a thread-safe way to generate random numbers.
Snake
The Snake class represents a snake entity in the game.
Snake.Part
The Part class represents a part of the snake's body.
SnakeColor
The SnakeColor enum represents the colors available for snakes in the game.
SnakeGame
The main class for the Snake game logic.
SnakePart
The SnakePart enum represents different parts of a snake sprite.
SpriteManager
The SpriteManager class manages the loading and retrieval of various sprites used in the game.
StartPanel
The StartPanel class represents the panel displayed at the start of the game.
TimerThread
A custom thread implementation for executing tasks at regular intervals.
